# Eighting Resource Viewer

## Bump MOT Number to 0xFFF

```
04095010 38A00FFF
```

## Hold R to Increase by 0x10

```
0400a77c 48000010
C200A7D4 00000004
574606B4 2C060020
4182000C 38630001
48000008 38630010
60000000 00000000
C200A820 00000004
574606B4 2C060020
4182000C 3863FFFF
48000008 3863FFF0
60000000 00000000
```
